Analyzing Bo Horvat’s Next Contract

With the start of the preseason looming, the Vancouver Canucks have just one restricted free agent left to sign. Unfortunately for them, this free agent happens to be one of their most important players going forward. In his three seasons as a Canuck, Bo Horvat has emerged as one of the team’s brightest stars, making this an important deal for General Manager Jim Benning to get right. What do the Canucks have in Markus Granlund?

Of all the players acquired during Jim Benning’s tenure as General Manager, it’s hard to think of a player more polarizing than Markus Granlund. The trade that brought him to Vancouver saw former first-round pick and top prospect Hunter Shinkaruk headed to one of the team’s top rivals in Calgary, and Canucks fans have been divided on his value ever since.
